meanings.sent1: She telexed the important document to the client.
meanings.sent2: He always telexes his reports to headquarters.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally telexed a string of random characters.
meanings.sent4: Her words telexed a sense of urgency to the team.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the telex machine echoed through the office.

meanings.sent1: The telexed message contained vital information.
meanings.sent2: They received a telexed document from overseas.
meanings.sent3: The telexed note was full of spelling errors.
meanings.sent4: His eyes widened as he read the telexed letter.
meanings.sent5: The telexed paper rustled as she unfolded it.
